title: Application Description
description: A single-line description of the application (line breaks not allowed)
examples: Full-featured e-commerce platform with cart, checkout & payment processing

x-specs.given: an app with name and description
x-specs.then: description should be visible below the app name

x-specs.given: an app with only name (no description property)
x-specs.then: description element should NOT be rendered

x-specs.given: an app with name and description
x-specs.then: description MUST appear AFTER the h1 title in DOM order

x-specs.given: an app with description containing special characters
x-specs.then: special characters should be displayed correctly

x-specs.given: an app with description containing Unicode and emojis
x-specs.then: Unicode characters and emojis should be displayed correctly

x-specs.given: an app with very long description (500+ characters)
x-specs.then: description should wrap properly and remain visible

x-specs.given: an app with empty string description (not undefined)
x-specs.then: description element should NOT be rendered
